document.body:
Garcia's Cafe (970) 984-2415
Open everyday from 7:30AM to 9:30PM
Main menu Skip to content Home Contact Us Garcia’s Tres Leches Cake
Garcia’s
Garcia’s Cafe has been a part of Garfield County for over 10 years, and proudly caters to the New Castle community. Located in the Historic Downtown, Garcia’s offers a large selection of baked goods, delicious menu items, fresh cut meats, produce and a little bit of everything.
The goal behind Garcia’s has always been to be the“one stop shop”for all Mexican products. As years went by we added a variety of items to make it a more convenient by including baked goods, fast food, green produce, and a selection of fresh meats.
All of the menu items use ingredients sold at Garcia’s.
Garcia’s Cafe is open 7 days a week.
